#include<iostream>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<stdio.h>
using namespace std;
int min(int a,int b,int c)
{
  int mini;
  mini=((a<b)?((a<c)?a:c):((b<c)?b:c));
  return mini;
}
int main()
{
int tc,m,w,c,mf,wf,cf,total;
scanf("%d",&tc);
while(tc--)
{
  scanf("%d%d%d%d",&total,&m,&w,&c);
  cf=min(c,12*m,(4*total/5));
  cf=min(cf,10001,(m+w)*4);
  total-=cf;
  wf=min(w,2*m,(2*total/3));
  total-=wf;
  mf=(total<m?total:m);
  printf("%d %d %d\n",mf,wf,cf);
}
return 0;
}
